subject: Medicine
title: The Future of Placebo Science
description: A 60-second lesson on The Future of Placebo Science.

hook.text: Scientists are now mapping who responds best to placebos.

buildup.text: Genetic markers may predict your placebo sensitivity.

discovery.text: Brain scans can identify strong placebo responders in advance.

twist.text: Future trials may sort patients by their placebo profiles.

climax.text: Harnessing placebo power could make every treatment better.

punchline.text: Your genes may predict your belief power.
